Quests.Title: Clear The Lair
Quests.Description: Help Krobus by getting rid of the flies in the lair.
Quests.ReactionText: Thanks @! Meet me in the lair tomorrow.

Quests.Title: Clay for Krobus
Quests.Description: Gather clay so Krobus can reinforce the mounds in the lair and turn them into houses.

Quests.Title: Bone Fragments for Krobus
Quests.Description: Gather bone fragments so Krobus can reinforce the mounds in the lair and turn them into houses.

Quests.Title: Convince The Adventurer
Quests.Description: Convince Marlon to let Krobus start a colony of shadow people under Pelican Town.

Quests.Title: Convince The Wizard
Quests.Description: Convince Rasmodius to let Krobus start a colony of shadow people under Pelican Town.

Quests.Title: Sticks And Stones
Quests.Description: Help Marlon clear stone golems out of the mines.

Quests.Title: Sunny With A Chance Of Magic
Quests.Description: Rasmodius needs desert totems for a research trip.
Quests.Objective: Deliver 20 desert totems to the wizard.
Quests.ReactionText: Hm, these should suffice.#$b#Yes, fine, I won't stop you so long as they do not cause any disturbances to the town.#$b#Now leave me to my studies!

Quests.Title: Reaching Out
Quests.Description: Leave a note for the shadow people at the bottom of the mines.

Quests.Title: Lunarite
Quests.Description: Krobus wants to experiment with lair materials.
Quests.ReactionText: I like the texture!#$b#I wonder how they'll turn out.#$b#Thanks!

Quests.Title: Running On Empty
Quests.Description: Krobus is stocking up on emergency supplies for the lair.
Quests.ReactionText: Ugh, I really hope we don't have to resort to these.#$b#Thanks!

Quests.Title: Jailbirds
Quests.Description: Krobus needs some iron to prepare for a new arrival.
Quests.ReactionText: Thanks!#$b#I hope they get here soon.

OfferDetails.Text: Hi @,^^I'm experimenting with different materials to make the mounds in the lair more stable. Can you bring me some lunarite? Thanks!^^Krobus[
Hi @,^^I want to stock up on emergency supplies for the lair. Do you think you can help out? It doesn't have to be anything fancy. Thanks!^^Krobus[
Hi @,^^A new shadow person said they'll move in! It'll take them some time to get here, but they asked me to prepare a few things they'll need. Could you get me some iron please? Thanks!^^Krobus[
